key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks due to past SEC violations and FINRA fines
Significant exposure to the energy sector, making it vulnerable to oil and gas price fluctuations
Cybersecurity risks as a financial institution
Internal fraud and ethical concerns highlighted by embezzlement cases
Intense competition from larger national banks and fintech companies
controversies: $1.6 million SEC settlement for investor protection violations
Former employee charged with embezzling $4 million
environmental_issues: Exposure to energy sector volatility and potential regulatory changes
social_issues: Ethical concerns from ignored red flags in fraudulent bond offerings
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and past violations impacting investor confidence
Internal control weaknesses highlighted by embezzlement cases
